greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = numerator of H(n) taken mod n, where H(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} 1/k is the n-th harmonic number.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
mathematica: seq = {}; s = 0; Do[s += 1/n; AppendTo[seq, Mod[Numerator[s], n]], {n, 1, 79}]; seq (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 01 2020 *)
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Mar 02 2007
